snippet: A $150 million building devoted to artifacts from the American Revolution is to be constructed in Independence National Historic Park in Philadelphia.
abstract: Design for the $150 million Museum of the American Revolution is unveiled at the site in Independence National Historical Park in Philadelphia where it is to be constructed; museum will be devoted to artifacts from the Revolutionary War time period.
lead_paragraph: A $150 million building devoted to artifacts from the American Revolution is to be constructed in Independence National Historic Park in Philadelphia.

headline.seo: Revolution Museum Unveils Design by Robert A. M. Stern
headline.main: Design Shown for Museum of American Revolution
headline.print_headline: Design Shown for Museum Of American Revolution
